mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demo ( tinyint_demo, smallint_demo, int_demo, bigint_demo, float_demo, double_demo, decimal_demo, char_demo, varchar_demo, date_demo, time_demo, date_time_demo, time_stamp_demo ) VALUES ( #{tinyintDemo}, #{smallintDemo}, #{intDemo}, #{bigintDemo}, #{floatDemo}, #{doubleDemo}, #{decimalDemo}, #{charDemo}, #{varcharDemo}, #{dateDemo}, #{timeDemo}, #{dateTimeDemo}, #{timeStampDemo} )

INSERT INTO demo ( tinyint_demo, smallint_demo, int_demo, bigint_demo, float_demo, double_demo, decimal_demo, char_demo, varchar_demo, date_demo, time_demo, date_time_demo, time_stamp_demo ) VALUES
( #{item.tinyintDemo}, #{item.smallintDemo}, #{item.intDemo}, #{item.bigintDemo}, #{item.floatDemo}, #{item.doubleDemo}, #{item.decimalDemo}, #{item.charDemo}, #{item.varcharDemo}, #{item.dateDemo}, #{item.timeDemo}, #{item.dateTimeDemo}, #{item.timeStampDemo} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, tinyint_demo, smallint_demo, int_demo, bigint_demo, float_demo, double_demo, decimal_demo, char_demo, varchar_demo, date_demo, time_demo, date_time_demo, time_stamp_demo FROM demo WHERE id = #{id}
